p: Plastic bags are produced from one of three basic polymers: polyethylene, high density polyethylene (HDPE), low density polyethylene (LDPE), or linear low density polyethylene (LLDPE). Supermarket plastic bags are usually made from HDPE. Plastics are not in and of themselves toxic or harmful. However, plastic bags are manufactured using organic and inorganic additives such as colorants and pigments, plasticizers, antioxidants, stabilizers and metals [3].
